taxonomicnotes: The species possibly comprises a multi-species complex, with different characters in each locality of Mae Klong, Malay Peninsula and Borneo, especially in juvenile forms.
rationale: The species is known from the Mae Klong and Chao Phraya basins in Thailand, to the Mekong basin, through the Malay Peninsula, to Sumatra, Java and Borneo (Kottelat et al.1993). Whilst the species requires study to resolve the taxonomic position of its various populations, it is assessed as Least Concern at present.
